column4: Hi everyone, have a problem with sound - no sound at all with Gutsy! I installed manually latest ALSA (v15) and no success. My sound log from alsa-script.sh is here  - http://pastebin.ca/755861. Please help
did you install from CD (clean install) or upgrade with upgrade-manager from feisty?
from CD. I updated but i got million other problems. so i reinstalled from live CD
can i have alsa and oss installed at the same time?
have you checked your mixer levels?
i did, even installed alsa gui mixer, nothing works
how can i debug it step by step?
checked lsmod for appropriate modules?
have a look here -  http://pastebin.ca/755861 is it all i need?
I'm not sure... sound is a bit of a black box to me.  My experience has always been either that it just worked, or just doesn't... :-/
speakers plugged in ;)
its a notebook :)
when you say you installed the latest Alsa manually, do you mean from ubuntu reps or from upstream source?
got sources (driver, lib, util) compiled installed
you tried it with the ubuntu ALSA first, I assume?
yes bu i couldnt run sound recorder and skype want working eather (no sound). Now i can round sound recorder but all apps without sound
did aps other than skype have sound?
yes
some of them did
that is a very odd problem indeed....  It is quite likely out of my league...
yeah im confused. i can try to reinstall it again, but i'm sick of doing it again and again
fair enough...  I really wish I could be more help.
no worries, thanks anyway
